name: Hunter's Path

description.0: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

passiveName: At the End of the Beast-Paths

0.0: Gain <cryo>12%</cryo> All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain the Tireless Hunt effect after hitting an opponent with a Charged Attack. This effect increases Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>160%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. This effect will be removed after 12 Charged Attacks or 10s. Only 1 instance of Tireless Hunt can be gained every 12s.
